ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: A collection of matrix functions for teaching and learning matrix linear algebra as used in multivariate statistical methods. These functions are mainly for tutorial purposes in learning matrix algebra ideas using R. In some cases, functions are provided for concepts available elsewhere in R, but where the function call or name is not obvious. In other cases, functions are provided to show or demonstrate an algorithm. In addition, a collection of functions are provided for drawing vector diagrams in 2D and 3D.

A collection of matrix functions for teaching and learning matrix linear algebra as used in multivariate statistical methods. These functions are mainly for tutorial purposes in learning matrix algebra ideas using R. In some cases, functions are provided for concepts available elsewhere in R, but where the function call or name is not obvious. In other cases, functions are provided to show or demonstrate an algorithm. In addition, a collection of functions are provided for drawing vector diagrams in 2D and 3D.

name: r-matlib
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.0.1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-matlib
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/matlib_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/matlib/matlib_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 7efb4f9683627bdbec3e8fdf385b317805ec492a8ea200678b2e7f1d799d4a58

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-car
    - r-dplyr
    - r-knitr
    - r-rgl
    - r-rmarkdown
    - r-rstudioapi
    - r-xtable
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-car
    - r-dplyr
    - r-knitr
    - r-rgl
    - r-rmarkdown
    - r-rstudioapi
    - r-xtable

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('matlib')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('matlib')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/friendly/matlib
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: A collection of matrix functions for teaching and learning matrix linear algebra as used in multivariate statistical methods. These functions are mainly for tutorial purposes in learning matrix algebra ideas using R. In some cases, functions are provided for concepts available elsewhere in R, but where the function
    call or name is not obvious. In other cases, functions are provided to show or demonstrate an algorithm. In addition, a collection of functions are provided for drawing vector diagrams in 2D and 3D.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - npavlovikj
